references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, a foundational technique for the video generation methods discussed in the paper.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, the core concept that underlies many modern image and video generation models, including those mentioned in the current work.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper is highly influential because it shows impressive results in generating photorealistic images from text prompts, a key capability relevant to the current paper's text-to-video goals.
This paper is significant because it integrates transformers with diffusion models, leading to more efficient and effective video generation.

references.paper_title: Photomaker: Customizing realistic human photos via stacked id embedding
references.reason: This paper presents a method for customizing realistic human photos while preserving identity, a key aspect relevant to the main topic of this paper.
